name: Etupirka - puffin bird numbers action
description:
Look at the order of the above figures, tap square button below!
And help the fly birds (Etupirka / Tufted puffin), and try to move to the location of the shrimp!

While enjoying an action game with cute characters, you can brain training
Moreover, it is early press and just the right game to train your finger roll!
